ThinBridge is an enterprise browser launcher for Windows. It has the following features:

* Switch between browsers based on a customizable URL list.
* Support IE/Edge/Firefox/Chrome
* Support Remote Desktop, VMware Horizon and Citrix.

This addon is the Google Chrome extension for ThinBridge.

## Quick Start

This addon depends on ThinBridge to launch other browsers from Chrome.
So you need to install ThinBridge first:

 1. Visit the release page of ThinBridge.
     https://gitlab.com/clear-code/thinbridge/-/releases
 2. Download the latest "ThinBridge.zip" (listed under "Binary Package").
 3. Unzip the ZIP archive.
 4. Execute "install.bat" with administrator privilege.

Then you can start using this addon:

 1. Launch Chrome and install this addon.
 2. Visit 'https://www.example.com/'
 3. You should see that the URL is automatically opened in IE.
